LanguageData.TKKN_NPS_LavaHasEruptedNearbyTxt: Lava is bubbling to the surface! Move your stuff away from the lava before it's damaged.
LanguageData.TKKN_NPS_TreasureWashedUpText: Treasure has washed up on the beach! Get it before it washes away.
LanguageData.TKKN_NPS_TreasureFloodedUpText: Recent flooding has left behind treasure! Get it before it washes away.
LanguageData.TKKN_NPS_UltraRareWashedUpText: Ultra rare treasure has washed up on the beach! Get it before it washes away.
LanguageData.TKKN_NPS_UltraRareFloodedUpText: Recent flooding has left behind ultra rare treasure! Get it before it washes away.
LanguageData.TKKN_NPS_MustPlaceOnSteamVent: You must place this on a steam vent
LanguageData.TKKN_spawnLavaOnlyInBiome_title: Lava eruptions outside of volcanic fields
LanguageData.TKKN_spawnLavaOnlyInBiome_text: Allow lava to erupt in almost every biome. Uncheck to make it so lava is only in the Volcanic Fields biome
LanguageData.TKKN_allowLavaEruption_text: Allow lava to erupt. Uncheck to remove the random eruption incidents
LanguageData.TKKN_showHot_text: When temperatures are hot, there will be visual indicators.
LanguageData.TKKN_showCold_text: When temperatures are cold, there will be visual indicators
LanguageData.TKKN_showRain_text: When it rains, the ground will get splatters and darken
LanguageData.TKKN_doWeather_text: If unchecked, none of the below will happen. If checked, only the ones checked below will happen.
LanguageData.TKKN_regen_text: Regenerates terrain on the currently loaded map so you can get flooding, tides, and/or an oasis in a save made before this mod was added. After saving this setting, make a new save file for your game (in case things go badly), then reload the game. Once you reload, UNCHECK THIS BOX.
